cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTVS GOVERNMENT)C.(59) 156 . r- COPY NO.19th October, 1959CABINETTHE QUEEN'S SPEECH ON THE OPENINGOF parliament note by the Minister of AviationWith regard to the draft of The queen's Speech on theOpening of Parliament, I should like to propose that the last twosentences of paragraph 14 should be revised to read as follows:-"A Bill will be laid before you for improving thearrangements for licensing air services and airlineoperators and to ensure the maintenance of high standards of safety."D. S.Ministry of Aviation, W. C. Z.19th October, 1959
